tag_list: stock-market, investor-relations, finance, small-cap-stocks, micro-cap-stocks, community, discussion-forum
overview:
George Tsiolis is the Founder of AGORACOM, the web’s largest small-cap stock community.

George launched AGORACOM as a stock market newsletter in 1997 after graduating from Osgoode Hall Law School in Toronto (1993) and being called to the Bar (1994).

Unlike serial entrepreneurs in the space, George has focused all of his efforts on making AGORACOM the home of small-cap public companies and their shareholders. In 2008, AGORACOM reported 1.2 million visitors, 7.6 million visits and 101 million page views for the year.

More importantly, AGORACOM generated 7-digit revenues and profits for the year without any advertising on the site.
